text: Alexander Paul Kapranos Huntley (born 20 March 1972), commonly known as Alex Kapranos, is an English musician. He is the lead singer of Scottish band Franz Ferdinand. Kapranos was born in Almondsbury, Gloucestershire to an English mother and Greek father. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1972 births Category:English guitarists Category:English rock musicians Category:English singers Category:Musicians from Gloucestershire Category:Musicians from Glasgow
title: Alex Kapranos
